name: tinder_like_profile
description: Like the currently shown profile on Tinder. Requires login.

steps.code: const likeBtn = document.querySelector('[aria-label="Like"], button[class*="recsGamepad__button--like"], button[class*="like"], button[class*="Bgi($g-ds-background-like)"]'); if (likeBtn) { likeBtn.click(); return { success: true, action: 'liked' }; } return { success: false, message: 'Like button not found' };
steps.name: result
steps.label: Click like
